sourceDesc.p: No source: created in electronic format.

encodingDesc.p: Encoding according to the CCH TEI Guidelines

div.p: Viennese daily newpaper, the full name of which was: Neues Wiener Tagblatt: Demokratisches Organ (New Viennese Daily: Democratic Organ), published by Mayer, 1867–1945.

div.head: The Neues Wiener Tagblatt and Schenker
div.p: Correspondence from Ludwig Karpath under the Neues Wiener Tablatt letterhead survives as part of OJ 12/9 (4 items: 1912, 1916); none is known to survive in the reverse direction. Schenker did not contribute to the paper.

Clippings of articles and reviews from it are preserved in Schenker' scrapbook (OC 2) dating from the years 1902 (review by Max Kalbeck), 1904, 1905, 1908 (review of Harmonielehre), 1913 (review of Beethovens Neunte Sinfonie), 1935 (obituaries), and 1937, and one item in a separate clippings collection (OC C) dating from 1920.
